modName: Fixed Barkeeper and Tavern Clothes for UNP
summary: Tavern clothes on females appear as barkeeper\'s clothes with a shortened skirt, and barkeeper\'s clothes no longer hide amulets and rings. This mod is intended for use with dimon99\'s \"DIMONIZED UNP female body\".
descriptionHtml:
Tavern clothes on females appear as barkeeper\'s clothes with a shortened skirt, and barkeeper\'s clothes no longer hide amulets and rings. This mod is intended for use with dimon99\'s \"DIMONIZED UNP female body\".

If you only want the new tavern clothes, there is an alternative version in the Files section that provides just that. It neither includes nor requires an ESP file (unlike the main version).

Credit goes to dimon99 for the tavern clothes meshes; they were taken from the \"Barkeeper cloth\" miscellaneous file for \"DIMONIZED UNP female body\" ([url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6709]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6709[/url]).
author: David Sid

files.name: Fixed Barkeeper and Tavern Clothes for UNP
